title: Resistance in the British empire
itunes:title: Resistance in the British empire
itunes:subtitle: Priyamvada Gopal speaks about her book Insurgent Empire, which explores opposition to British colonial rule. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Priyamvada Gopal speaks about her book Insurgent Empire, which explores opposition to British colonial rule both within the empire and in Britain itself. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
